description: Sven drafts a communique framing martial law as necessary to quell potential chaos and restore order, emphasizing public safety.
A controlled media release reassures the public that the military presence is temporary and focused on safeguarding citizens during system regulation.
Military Pragmatists lobby within the Council, securing approval for an expanded deployment of forces in key urban areas to maintain order amidst public unrest.
Authorities announce the imposition of martial law, justifying curfews as necessary to ensure stability and protect critical infrastructure during ongoing BCI disruptions.
Multiple incidents of security force overreach are reported at the curfews, leading to increasing public dissatisfaction and viral outrage on social media platforms.
Public protests grow as citizens demand an end to martial law, citing rights violations and severe disruptions to daily life.
